post.text:
Trump on Alicia in 1996: "Miss Piggy."

This morning: "She gained a massive amount of weight...it was a real problem."

comment.author: Erica
comment.text: You should have had a backbone, thicker skin, some confidence about ya! I mean you did win a crown correct? You are gonna let one mans opinion of you effect you to the point of having an eating disorder? Pitiful

replies.author: Eva
replies.text: One man? She was Miss universe, don't you think she felt more than just his eyes and judgement on her? - to walk in someone else's skin is impossible.
